title: That could happen
desc: art can serve as a tax deductable donation

panels.alt: A cowboy riding left to right, smoking. The sun is up and there are birds in the sky
panels.text:
art can show us 
 the world as it is, and 
 as it might be

panels.alt: A cowboy riding right to left, smoking. The moon is up and there are stars in the sky
panels.text:
for example a cowboy 
 riding a horse and 
 wearing a hat
